sentences.en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

sentences.en: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!
As a child she fought with her younger sister.
sentences.cn: 她小时候会和妹妹打架。

sentences.en: He is a model professional and an example to the younger lads.
sentences.cn: 他是个模范的专业人士，是年轻人的榜样。

sentences.en: His fresh complexion made him look younger than he was.
sentences.cn: 他的好气色令他看上去比实际年龄年轻。

sentences.en: His mother looked ten years younger in jeans and flats.
sentences.cn: 他妈妈穿上牛仔裤和平跟鞋，看上去年轻了10岁。

sentences.en: I saw in him a mirror image of my younger self.
sentences.cn: 我在他身上看见了年轻时的自己。

sentences.en: I wish I'd discovered photography when I was younger.
sentences.cn: 我要是早点接触到摄影技术就好了。

sentences.en: I'm only 5ft tall, and I look younger than my age.
sentences.cn: 我才5英尺高，显得比实际年龄小。

sentences.en: In her younger days my mother had been a successful fashionwear saleswoman.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈年轻时曾经是个成功的时装销售员。

sentences.en: Mr Honda was himself a keen racing driver in his younger days.
sentences.cn: 本田先生自己年轻时就是位热衷赛车的车手。

sentences.en: She vacillates between men twice her age and men younger than she.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫不决，不知道是该选择年龄比她大一倍的男人还是比她小的男人。

sentences.en: Some of the younger men began to pelt one another with snowballs.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻人开始相互投掷雪球。

sentences.en: The pictures were sensationalist and could seriously disturb younger readers.
sentences.cn: 这些图片大肆渲染，会让一些比较年轻的读者们惶恐不安。

sentences.en: The younger people might not like the idea.
sentences.cn: 年轻一些的人可能不喜欢这个主意。

sentences.en: They looked younger than I knew them to be.
sentences.cn: 他们看起来比我所知道的实际年龄显小。

words.tran_cn: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
年轻地，无经验地；精神饱满地
青年；青春；年轻；青少年时期

trans.tran_cn: 较年轻的，年幼的( young的比较级 )，有朝气的，年轻人的，青年的
